286a7(rgyud): g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la ni// tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying gnas pa/ g.yon brkyang gar bzhugs stag sham can// phuHsgrogs klu chen brgyad kyis rgyan// dmar
286a8(rgyud): ser gyed sgra spyan rtsa dmar// spyan zlum khro tshul mche ba gtsigs// tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug chen sogs lha rnams dang // lha ma yin rnams skrag par byed// bskal pa'i ma
286b1(rgyud): 'od 'bar dbus na// khro bo'i du ma'i tshogs dang bcas// brtan g.yo khams gsum ma lus rnams// rang gi sprul par shes byas nas// de ltar gus bcas yun ri su// rgyun mi 'chad par gang bsgoms
286b2(rgyud): pas// las dang nyon mongs kyis bslad pa'i// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog ldog/ bdag 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor la// shin tu yi brtan byed 'gyur na// ral gri la sogs grub brgyad kyis// snong du rnal 'byor
286b3(rgyud): ba de 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos mi bzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam mkha'
286b4(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// haM gaM yi ge las skyes par// drag chen khro bo'i rgyal po ni// sngonag zhal gsum phyag drug sbom// ral gri chu gri sta ra ni// g.yas kyi phyag na rim bzhin 'dzin
286b5(rgyud): bsngags mdzub 'khor lo kha nA ni// g.yon gyi phyag na rim bzhin 'dzin// spyan gsum khro gnyer gyen du bskyod// bu sgra smar gyen 'greng ser// rol pa'i klu yi rgyan gyis brgyan// 
286b6(rgyud): bod pa'i phreng ba stag sham can// glang chen lpags pas stod g.yogs byas// rus pa'i rgyan gyis rab brgyan cing // pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan dbus na// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul du bgyid // haM
286b7(rgyud): pheng na mkha'i phyogs sgrogs pa// bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che// 'di ltar skad cig dran pa 'am// mang shes tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub// de nas bcom ldan 'das bub pa chen po 'jig rten dbang
286b8(rgyud): phyug rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang bugs rdo rje las phyung // na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// me las skyes pa'i mi g.yo ba// 
287a1(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po'i bsam par bya// yi dgas drod kyi steng na bgying // zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs kyang bzhi// g.yas pa ral gri rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub bod khrag
287a2(rgyud): go/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi'i steng na 'gying // sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan ldan zhing // stag gi sham babs rnar rgyan// stod du ru ra'i lpags pas rgyan// dmar ser gyer sgra 'jigs tshul che// ha har bzhad cing
287a3(rgyud): rtag skad 'tsher// khro bo du ma'i sprir spro zhing // zhal rnams gdangs pas mche ba gtsigs// spyan bcu gnyis po rab tu bgrang // 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// char sprin mdog 'dra ma chen gzi// 
287a4(rgyud): khams chen 'dod pa 'ang 'dis rdzogs byed// de nas ya nga bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po mi 'gyur rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung
287a5(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbu sa gnas par// yo ge hUM las byung ba yi// mi g.yo mgon po gtu ma 'che// bdud rtsi rnams skrag byed bsgom par bya// zhal gcig
287a6(rgyud): phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i sku// pang dkar nyi ma'i steng dkyil na// dbus mo sa la btsugs nas bzhugs// phyag g.yas ral gri 'dzin pa ste// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin// spyan gnyis
287a7(rgyud): dmar la zlum pa ste// gzhon nu khros pa'i cha byad can// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// sbrul dkar po yis do shal byas// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs khro bo rnam par 'gro// 
287a8(rgyud): bskal pa'i me yi dbus na gnas// gang gis nyi ma zla ba yi// mdun du rnam par dran byed na// bdun rnams ma lus zad nas ni// bde ba chen po'i lus rnyed 'gyur// a ta sa yi me tog gi// 'od ldan pa
287b1(rgyud): ldan lha yis mchod// bdag gi snying ngam snying dkyil sgom// myur du 'dod pa rdzogs par byed// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ngu ba'i mdog/ yang na sngon po bai mUr gzi// bdud rnas
287b2(rgyud): brlag par mdzad pa'o// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum bzhugs pa 'am// yang na g.yon pa sa la btsugs// thabs tshul rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa// blo gros phung po rgyas
287b3(rgyud): par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po yongasu rgyas pa dpal gyi rdo rje zhes pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dam tshig
287b4(rgyud): sa da' lta bu yi// ye shes sems dpa' snying kar sgo ma// 'od ni cher 'bar drag po'i gzi// shes bya'i sgrib las rnar rgya la// de yi thugs kar mtshan ma ste// sa bon rtag par dmigs pa ni// 
287b5(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa rnam dag rgyu// las kyi las rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// sa bor las ni 'od zer 'phros// ye shes so mas dpa' bkug nas gzhug/ des ni mi shes bag chags
287b6(rgyud): rnams// blo ldan po la 'jog mi shes// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dmigs nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur 'gyur// spyi bor rang gi rigs bsams nas// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu rgyan 'gyur// 
287b7(rgyud): de ltar de la brtson chen bya// 'dis ri rgyal ba rnapas mnyes gyur des// myur du rgyal ba nyid thob 'gyur// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
287b8(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// dge byed ras ris bkra shis kyis// sdig pa'i dri ma rnams bsal nas// sgrub po rnams la mchod ster byed// gtsang byed bram ze las rnyed dam// rgyal po 'am bu mo bzang gi
288a1(rgyud): ras// 'jam zhing 'bas par brdungs byas te// 'dod pa bzhin du bri bar bya// rams sam mig smad khu ba dang // sman gsum me tog gnyis ldan pa'i// khu ba shing sbyin
288a2(rgyud): gsum spyang gnas// gzhan yang sna tshogs tshon gyis bris// de las khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste// g.yas ral gri/ g.yon bsdigs mdzub zhags pa da
288a3(rgyud): 'brel pa/ klus rgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng na g.yon brkyang bas 'gying zhing bskal pa'i ma'i nang mkhro bo du ma'i tshogs 'phro badra'o// lha'i dbang phyug mi g.yo mgon
288a4(rgyud): ni zhal gsum/ phyag drug pa zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ zhal re re spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa'o// sgra ser po gyen du brdzes pa// phyag g.yas gsum na ral gri dang / 
288a5(rgyud): chu gri dang / sta re bsnams pa// g.yon gsum na bsdigs mdzub dang / 'khor lo dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ klus rgyan cing bod pa'i do shal can// stag gi sham babs dang / glang po che'i stong
288a6(rgyud): g.yogs dang / bong ba'i lnga'i dbu rgyan can// rus pas rgyun cing pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng na g.yon brkyang zhing g.yas skum pa'i tshul gyis 'gying ba/ bskal pa'i me'i gzi mdangs kyi nang nas khro bo cu
288a7(rgyud): 'phro ba bri'o// lha min rgyal po mo g.yo ba ni zhal bzhi re re la yang spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa/ phyag bzhi'i g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rdo rje/ yon gnyis na bsdigs mdzub dang bong khrag can
288a8(rgyud): stod la mi'i lpags pa gyon zhing // stag gi sham babs can/ rus pa dang / klus yan lag rgyan pa/ bskal pa'i me 'bar zhing khro bo'i tsho gas sprid du 'phro ba/ pad+ma la zhabs bzhis bdung bzhi
288b1(rgyud): mnad cing / skra ser po gyen du brjes pa dri'o// bdud thams cad 'dub ba'i mi g.yo ba ni gtum po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri dang / zhags pas brel ba/ skra nag po 'am ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ rin
288b2(rgyud): po che'i cod par dang / ngo shal dang / yan lag thams cad brgyan cing stag gi sham thabs can// sprul dkar pos se ral kar thogs pa/ bskal pa'i tshogs kyi mer 'bar ba'i nang na khro bo dum
288b3(rgyud): 'khrug cing pad+ma dang / nyi ma la dbus mo g.yas pa 'thab stangs kyi tshul du bzhugs pa 'am/ yang na g.yon pa gshed po'i tshul du bcugs shing lhag pa na mkha' la 'greng zhing bteg pa dril
288b4(rgyud): gang yang rang 'dod pa zhig de ltar bris nas de 'i mdun du rang nyid kyi 'dra 'bag tshon sna tshogs kyis bris la/ ri mo mkhan la go ba legs par bskyed nas/ mdzes pa yon
288b5(rgyud): du phul nas bkris brjod nas// rang gi gnas kyi dben pa'i phyogasu bzhugs pa la mngon sum du mi g.yo ba ra bsgrubs te/ me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod
288b6(rgyud): nas/ ye shes kyi khro bo'i rgyal po yang de nyid la bstim par bya'o// gang yang dngos grub 'dod pas spos dang / me tog dang / spyan ma dang / zhal zas dang / gos la sogs pas rgyun tu mchodan
288b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsang sngags 'grub pa la gdon mi ze'o// 'dir skye bo 'ga' ni dman pa ste// spurang ba 'debs na shin tu yang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir spu dben po'i sa phyogs
288b8(rgyud): sba bar bya'o// ni rgyas dbang dang bsad pa'am// ral gri la sogs brgyad rnams dang // mchog gi sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan las rnyed 'gyur// 'phags pa mi gas
289a1(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba rnam par dag byed cing // dngos grub myur
289a2(rgyud): phyir gsang sngags rnams// rim pa dbye ba ngo mtshang nyon// bcu bzhi'i dbyangs las yum gyi rgyan// gsal byed gnyis pa'i dang po la// gsub pa'i lnga pas nye bar rgyan// gsum pa'i gsum pa de
289a3(rgyud): bzhago/ lnga pa'i lnga pa brgyad pa la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas mdzes par byas// me dang dbyangs bcu gsum par 'brel// drong gnyis pa dang drag mtha' 'brel// sum cu gsum dang dbyangs drug 'brel/ 
289a4(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga pas brgyan no// nyi shu gnyis dang ba gcig 'brel// de la'i zlas ram rgyan pa'o// gsang sngags rgya la ba yi ge bcu// srang khri 'bum 'am bye ba bcu// sa ya
289a5(rgyud): kyang lha mthong 'gyur// snying po sdog bral dga' ba ste// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// sdug bsngal zad byed bde ba che// sgrub pa rnams la skyed byed pa'i// 
289a6(rgyud): gsang sngags drag po drang byed na// 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe ring 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'gyur gzhan ci smos// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&6/ gzung ba dag pa ye shes kyi sngag/ 
289a7(rgyud): sa/ oM shU n+ya bAd+d+hA na badz+ra sa b+hA la At+ma koH/ 'dzin pa'i sems dag pa ye shes kyi sngag so// oM badz+ra shud+d+ha/ sru brtan ba rdo rje ye shes kyi sngags// oM kI sa ShA hrI t+ta badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+maH
289a8(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi sngags/ oM a tsal te dza badz+ra pu shwe/ drA be dI pa/ gan+d+ha/ ne'i d+ye/ sa pa ri bI re b+h+yaHdzaHhUb ho// sad+hi btA sarba satwa rA/ oM maM ba liM gr-isma ga pa kha hiSha
289b1(rgyud): biHk+Sha b+ha ny+dzan pU phaT/ mchod pa dang gtor ma'i sngags// na dnga'am 'bras cher dang / sa lu dkar dang til dkar dang / grong du nas dang pra ba dang / shing rtog la sogs rtag pang mtshad / oM tsaN+Da ma hA
289b2(rgyud): ro Sha Na hU maN+Da la ma d+he A gats+tsha dza ya sa ma ya swA// spyan drang ba'i sngag so// oM tsar+N+Na ma hA ro Sha Na ma ma sha tru a mu ke s+ya sha rI re kI la ya hUM phaT/ ka ti mu ta sAm+b+ha ya/ hrid kI la ya hUM phaT/ 
289b3(rgyud): de kA la swA hA/ phung bu gdab pa'i sngagaso// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA kr-i d+ha badz+rA NAM/ oM a tsa la kA ma ka na na tA ma hA ro ShaN s+pho Ta ya hU~M dzA hrI na/ las la bskul ba'i sngags// na maHsa man+ta/ 
289b4(rgyud): ya bAk+Shit+ta/ badz+ra NAM/ oM a tsa la ka na tsat+ta ta na ta na man+ta man+ta/ moT moT/ tan+da tan+ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ma hA man+ta b+ha la ka/ d+yu na d+yAn/ ti
289b5(rgyud): ni ti ni/ khA da khA de/ big+h+nAn/ mA ra mA ra/ duSh+TAn duSh+Tam rak+Sha hA/ sar+b+bA na/ ku ru ku ru/ kika ri ki ri/ ma hA big+h+ra badz+ras+phoT ya s+phoT ya/ hA hUM hUM/ tra bi la ra ga na rak+ta/ ma mi a/ 
289b6(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM/ a tsa le te tsa/ s+pho ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hwe hUM/ a man+tika/ kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ sha dzA ya/ ma nA ya/ man+tha hA me/ shu d+d+ha tu mok+Sha/ du bya du/ badz+ra nA ma tAM a pra ti hAtra b+h+yaHdz+wa lA ya tra ya/ a sa ha
289b7(rgyud): ma hA sA hA/ las thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i sngagaso// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAkr-i d+ha badz+rA tA/ oM tra tra a ma g+ha/ tsaN+Da ma hA roShaH/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra mA ya tra mA ya hU~Mdza ta ha maM/ oM ba li ta jom
289b8(rgyud): ni sAhA/ cho ga bde rje su 'gro ba'i sngagaso// na maHsa man+te kA ya bA kid+h+ya badz+rA NA/ oM a mo g+ha/ e h+ye hi mA pra ti ha ta me e h+ye hi a tsa la wa te dza/ a man+ta ka na/ teSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsu ru tsu ru/  DI taH/ 
290a1(rgyud): taT traH/ big+h+na/ g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA ngas/ s+pho Ta ya/ dzatatas+ya/ tsa men/ a nub mad+ha/ mA dz+nyA ku ru/ ma sa dang / a na ma gra ka Ta kaT/ pa maT/ tsaH/ a Ni la/ 
290a2(rgyud): hi ma hA ka ru Na/ bi Sha Na/ nan+da/ nan+ta/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ a tsal te dza/ sarba tra a nut+tA re ki tsata/ tarbaH taN/ d+harma d+harma/ phaT phaT haM/ 'di ni srung ba dam pa'i sngag so// khra ba'i rgyal po mi gam
290a3(rgyud): ba'i// gang gis gsang sngags rnams shes na// yi ge tsam gyi bdud brlag byed// mang du brjod na smos ci dgos// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang sngags rnams 'byung ba'i le'u ste ba'i
290a4(rgyud): ba'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gas rang sngags grub pa las byung ba'i// las kyi sbyor ba'i dbye ba yis// 'dod rnams shin tu 'grub byed de// bsam gtan rnam dag chos
290a5(rgyud): rnam dag/ ye shes rnam dag sku rnam dag/ rang 'byung / ma dag don nam dag/ bya ba rnam dag byed pa dag/ sgyu ma spu'i ma 'i ye shes che// sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor dang / mig
290a6(rgyud): yod smig rgyu'i gzugs brnyan 'brel// sna tshogs chu bur bzhin g.yo ba'i// gang gis bdud las rgyal byed pa'i// nyungs kar rgyal po bsgrub par bya// rgyal gyi skar mar bcugs byas te/ bod pa da/ 
290a7(rgyud): po dri chus bran// 'di ni las rnams kun bya'i phyir// dusu srung zhing bskyed bya ste// du su mchod dang gtor ma byas// bar chad kun las rnam rgyal yin// yang na gro ga 'am spra tshil la sbrul nag po'i gzugs
290a8(rgyud): byas nas gu gul tshil chen gyis bdug cing sngags drag du brjod do// gang 'dod pa'i lus la byabs nas khrus byas te rtsa ku sha chun pos 'og nas g.yug cing / nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dun ti/ pu ta
290b1(rgyud): pu ta phaT ces brjod na gang la klu gnod pa de sos par byed do// yang na gong du bstan pa'i yungs kar dang / gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags drag tu brjod na klu 'broso// slar yang mi ldog go// 'byung
290b2(rgyud): po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zad pa la nyungs kar bskyed pa la sngags mang du bzlas nas gtor na 'bye ro// byis pa gsar du btsas pa srung ba ni kham phor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa bcang ngo // spra tshil gyi
290b3(rgyud): gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas pa'i snying kar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bcug la kha la tsher ma btsugs na bsgrub bya'i kha la tsher ma btsugs par 'gyuraro// rkang pa la btsugs na
290b4(rgyud): rang so// snying la btsugs na dran pa stor bar byed do// mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i phur bu 'am/ lcags phur yan lag gang dang / gang la btab pa de zha ba 'am rengs par byed do// dur khrod
290b5(rgyud): bal ba la lan mang du bsngags nas dgra bo'i sgo 'og tu btab na 'byer ro// g.yul du zhugs nas ral gril bsngags te bzung ma rgyalo// gang la yang gtor ma'i bye brag
290b6(rgyud): gis 'grub de so// dur khrod du phyin te snod thod pa la pad+ma sAl dkar po'i sdong bu dang / tshil chen gyi mar me byas la tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la sbar ba'i ngu ba mig la byugs na gzhan gyis mthong na
290b7(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma 'am zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe// mig g.yo mgon po'i sku khams pa la byas nas me tog shel pa li ka 'am/ da mthong ba las byas mchod cing sngags mtshan
290b8(rgyud): bo ga bag bzlas pas tshe lo song bu'o// yang zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe dum bu drug pa'i bod par khrag sna tshogs blugs te/ maN+Dal nag po'i 'og tu bzhag nas kha me long gis bcad de/ de'i ste
291a1(rgyud): du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo ba bzhag ste/ rang nyid gcer bu'i lus ma he'i rnam lngas byugs te/ mtshan thog thag bzlas na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyuraro// yang
291a2(rgyud): nyi ma zla ba gzas bzung ba'i tshe maN+Dal gru bzhi pa byas nas grwa bzhir ral gri btsugs la/ rang nyid gcer pu lus thams cad thal bas byugs te mtshan thog bag bzlas na srid pa gsum gsal bar
291a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gal te gter kha dbye par 'dod pas mi gamo mgon po'i sku kham pa las byas la/ sman drug la sogs pa dri zhim po thams cad dang lhan cig pa'i rin po che'i snong kha sbyar du bcug nas maN+Dal
291a4(rgyud): dkar po'i dbusu khri'u la bzhag nas/ dus gsum du mchod cing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gsol ba gdab cing a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos sreg cing bstod pa byas na zla ba
291a5(rgyud): gsum gyi rjesu gter rnyed nge so// gal te car 'thed sa par 'dod nak+Sha yod pa'i gnasu klu'i dkyil 'khor byas te sgra tshil lam bag zan la dga' ba la sogs pa'i gzugs byas
291a6(rgyud): / kha dog pa dang par byas nas maN+Dal deng bzhugs te/ dam tshig pa bskyed nas dbusu mi g.yo mgan po dang bcas pa la ye shes kyi lha bcug nas/ ka ra dang / bu ra ma dang / sbrang dang / 'o ma la sogs
291a7(rgyud): bas mchod cing rtsa ba'i sngags 'brug ltar bsgrags pas klu rnams skrag nas chang pa'i rgyud 'bebs par byed// gal te mi 'bab na bod pa dum bu gcig par klu'i gzugs rnams bcug la bdug
291a8(rgyud): ya can gyi mes bsros nachar shing rta phang lo tsam zhag bdun du 'bebs pa la be tsam med do// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ka phra mo'i le'u lnga pa'o// 
291b1(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsam gtan brtan las byung ba ni// 'khrul med nyid do gnod rnams sel/ khams gsum rgyal po cher nyon cig/ spro ba sdu'i rim pa goms gyur las// ji srid 'jong
291b2(rgyud): kyi dus par du// rang sems gnas nas brtan par 'gyur// dngos med dngos sogs ma lus pa'i// rnam rtog rab rib kun bsal nas// nyon mongs nad rnams ma lus pa// bag chags dang bcas
291b3(rgyud): gtan bcom nas// 'phral du yang ni brod ka skye// spro yang mi dmigs bsdu mi dmigs// skye med 'gag med ting 'dzin// 'byung med 'gro med bsam gtan la// gnas na ye shes myur du thob// bla
291b4(rgyud): med ye shes yon+ta dang // mthu rnams che bar 'gyur ba ni// bla ma mnyes las rnyed 'gyur ba'i'o// de nyid bdud rtsi bcu kyis lan// gus pas rtag par nyin mtshan du// rgyun chad mad
291b5(rgyud): par goms byas nas// myur du phyag rgya chen po yi// dngos grub snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'bad rtsol byang chub yan lag ste// le lo gnyid dang g.yeng ba spang // sngags la
291b6(rgyud): dmigs pa brtan gyur cing // bsam gtan bon nas 'khrul 'khor brtsam// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par la// gro ga 'am yang na shin shun la/ gur gum gi wang tsan dan gyis// rdo rje rgya khram mu khyud bcas
291b7(rgyud): dbu su ming dang sngags spel bri// bu khyud la ni rtsa sngags bri// ra kun lani hUMd meng // sbal te g.yas nas bskang la bri// dkyil 'kho ra dag pa'i dbusun// me tog dgang po srung bzhag nas// 
291b8(rgyud): lha yi skur ni bskyed byas te// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas// gang zhig 'dod pa'i dpung pa 'am// lus la bcangs na srung bar byed// kham phor sar pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris te/ sgor bcangs
292a1(rgyud): nagasar du brtsas pa'i byis pa srung ngo // dur khrod kyi ras la sngags ming dang bcas pa bris te/ spra tshil gyis gtum nas dur khrod kyis bum par bcug nas// kha rdo rje n+ya gras
292a2(rgyud): gyis bcad de sbas na mngal skems par byed do// phyung nas 'o mas bkrus na so so// gal te bsad par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por byas pa'i steng du kham pa las byas pa'i mi g.yo mag
292a3(rgyud): bo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa gnyis na ngal gri dang rdo rje/ bsdigs mdzub dang / bong khrag g.yon na 'chang ba byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhug so// de nas dri ma drug dang bag zan
292a4(rgyud): las bsgrub bya'i gzugs sor brgyad byas nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i sham bu dang bcas pa snying kar bcug ste de'i sku'i zhabasu bzhag nas rang nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
292a5(rgyud): pas zur bzhir mi rus sam seng ldeng ngam lugs la sa byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag pa la/ bun mtshams pa mas cad du btab par shes pa brgyal bar bas mo// dang
292a6(rgyud): kyis mdun gyi phur ba mi g.yo bar bsgoms pa'i thug sa bskul nas/ de las khro bo lcags kyu dang zhags pa bogs pa grangs med pa spros pas/ bsgrub bya rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag nas 'os
292a7(rgyud): pas skad cig tsam gyis phung po gtor nas/ shes pa ling ka la bstim par bya'o// de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcag tu byas pas hom khung du sreg pa 'am// mnan pa byas na dbang phyug chen po yang gas
292a8(rgyud): par nges na gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos yang na dur dang / khyi khrag dang / nya'i khrag gis 'khor lo ral gri rtse mo ltang rno bar byas nas/ lte ba'i dbusu gru gsum me'i nang du bsgrub bya'i ming nga
292b1(rgyud): rgyud du bcas pa dris la/ de zhags pas bskor bar bya'o// rtsibs rnas su sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad pa bri'o// mu khyud la ming dang bcas pa'i snying po bri'o// de'i rgyab kyi mu khyud la las bde ba bri'o// mu khyud
292b2(rgyud): gsum pa la rdo rje dang ral gri spel nas bri bar bya'o// de nas phod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas zhing skas bcings te/ bsgrub bya dag za ba'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas khro bos shin tu khros pas ldag
292b3(rgyud): 'dren pa'i lta bas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gang la byas pa rade khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi'o// dung khrod du sras na mtshon gyi bskal pa babs nas 'cha'o// shing gcig gi rtsar sbas mangs
292b4(rgyud): mdor sbas na 'byor ro// lam rgya bram du sras man+mA/ lha chen 'basu sbas nazha bar 'gyur// klu yod pa'i sar sba namachis zin pa la bcom me ngo// rang nyid kyi nyal ba'i zhang
292b5(rgyud): sbas na 'dod pa'i bu mo khugaso// ci ste rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na dmag kyang rang so// de dag thams cad la khro bo 'bar ba dud pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa phyag bzhi zhabs
292b6(rgyud): bzhi// spyar gsum dang ldan par blta'o// dur khrod kyi ras la dmag dpon gyi ming dang spel ba'i sngags rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte bar bris la mtha' yi ge lam brgyad kyis ma nan te/ de'i phyi rol tu
292b7(rgyud): chen gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rgya khram bris la/ de sgra tshal las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag pa'i snying kar bcug nas gang 'bab pa'i mtsham su bzhag na dmag rang so// gzhan yang gza' skar la
292b8(rgyud): bltas te 'phyar ro// bslang bar 'dod na gro ga 'am ras la bya rog dang 'ug pa'i khrag gis gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ uts+tsha DA ya spel bar bya'o// char che ba 'am ser ba bcang
293a1(rgyud): 'dod na grog la gur gum mam gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa byas la mu khyud gsum pa byas te/ rtsibs bzhi la snying po'i sngags yi ge sbrul bskor ba'i bris pa
293a2(rgyud): dbus kyi lte bar yi ge b+hUM bris te// de la rtsa ba'i sngags g.yon bskor du byis nas/ mu khyud dang po la las thams cad pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa la ral gri'i phreng ba/ gsum pa la kun tu
293a3(rgyud): ri'o// de ltar dmigs te mchod nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na char ches pa dang ser ba 'chad par 'gyuraro// yang bsad par 'dod pas kham pa'i spar bu la mi g.yo ba'i snying po mtshal gyis
293a4(rgyud): g.yon skor du bris nas dkyil 'khor gru gsum gyi nang du gong du bstan pa'i ling ka'i snying kar ming dang bcas pa bcug nas gar rgyal du steng du kha gzar te/ las bams cad pa'i
293a5(rgyud): sngags bzlas shing zhag bcu drug tu las bya'o// de nas dur khrod kyi sa la byas pa'i mchod rten khru gang ba nag po 'ibum pa'i nang du rang gis srung ba nyid bcug nas/ mchod
293a6(rgyud): bang rims gsum man chad stong pa'i nang du tsha cha lnga bzhag pas/ gru gsum kha bkab cing lho phyogasu bzhago// des zla ba gnyis na 'chings ngeso// gal te gzhan gyi rig sngags bcad par 'dod
293a7(rgyud): dbang chen gyi dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po bris te/ zur bde rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan par byas nas/ grwa thams cad laM gyis mtshan pa ste/ rdo rje phur pa bsgrub bya'i ling ka'i steng du mdad ra/ zhag
293a8(rgyud): bdun gyis rigs sngags 'chad do// yang na hUM bzhi mgo sprad pa'i 'khrul 'khor// da ni tsu tsun d+ha ra'i lpags pa la 'khrul 'khor rengs pa'i sbyor ba dang bcas pa 'am/ sbru la sdong bu byas
293b1(rgyud): shing tshil la mar me byas nas/ ngu ba de bzhad nas mig la bskus na dgras mi mthong ngo // yang dpral bar thig le bya ste lag pa la bskus na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur de so// rkang pa la bskus na
293b2(rgyud): dpag tshad brgyar 'gro nuso// sa lu'i phye ma la gzugs byas te phye ma des bskus na dgra rengs par byed do// dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bcas pas dgra bo'i sgo 'am dpung la gtor na nad kyis bebs// tsu tsu
293b3(rgyud): d+ha ra'i lpags pa la 'khrul 'khor bros nas dbugs kyis brgyangs te sngag song bzlas na dgra de spos nas 'chi'o// de la sngags ni/ tad+ya bA/ na ma stu te/ ma hA ga Na pa ta ya swA hA// oM ga ga na a d+hi
293b4(rgyud): pa Na ye swA hA/ oM ga Na ba ti pra dz+nyA pa taM ye swA hA/ na ma stu ti ma hA ga Na pa ta ya sAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ dA ra dA ra/ dA ra bi dA ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ da d+ha ba da d+ha ba/ ga ra ga ra/ 
293b5(rgyud): dz+dzadza d+hadz+ra/ mo oM sa d+hi r+thi hi/ d+hA pa ya d+hi pa ya/ ya n+ya d+hA ya n+ta/ sid+d+hi m+ba pra yash+tsa/ sa ma sa ma mA ra sa ma nu sma ra ya ma pra tra pA tsa nA ya swA hA/ ma~M ku ru ku rba swAhA/ oM hur+ra tu
293b6(rgyud): ru swA hA oMngs ma ma man mo shI rI wa~M Sh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ oM ga/ kr-i d+hu kr-i bi hi tsit+ta/ ma hA bi b+ha ga gas ts+tshin+ti/ ma hA d+ha ya/ pa ra kra ma/ ma hA hasti/ ma hA b+ha kr-i N+Di ya/ pra tsit+ti yA mi swA hA/ oM ku ru Ta

293b8(rgyud): gum dang / gi wang dang / yung ba ser pos rgyal po'i ras la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi steng du ri rab rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan pa bris la/ ye dang la rim pa bzhir du bkod nas de'i dbu su
294a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po byi sa la zhon pa// kha dog gser po bcom lta bu zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na bgrang phreng / g.yon dang por rtse gsum/ 'og ma gnyis kyis thod pa ba
294a2(rgyud): rtsis bkang ba 'dzin pa/ sA na mkha' la phyar nas lta ba bris te/ de'i snying kar zla ba ljang ku'i steng du la ma yam lam bris la rnal 'byor ba dbang chen yongasu rgyas pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngag
294a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rlung bcing ba'i mchog yin no// yang thog gam shing gi rtse mo la bzhag na rlung bcing bar byed do// da ni tshogs kyi bdag po yi// sna tshogs las grub 'di bshad bya// rdo rje rtsegs
294a4(rgyud): gyis mtshan pa'i// nga'i cin nanyis cag dadus ni gal gcig phyag ba'i cha gsum 'i byin thos la bzang bre nga// ma sha ka ni bzung byas te/ khyo ba'i se nasems da
294a5(rgyud): skyil krung gis bzhugs khros nas ni// sngon po rin na rgyan gyis brgyan// bsams la la dul phug dang // 'o ma da zho dang sbrang dkar dang // mar dang chan dang sran ma sha/ bcos pa
294a6(rgyud): sho dang shing thog rnams// dus dang dus mchod byas na// gter rnams 'di yi gter bar byed// yang na bdag nyid mi g.yo ba// zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa'i sku// ral gri mnga' dang rdo rje g.yas/

294a8(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma la// bzhengs te mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa// bskyed nas btsos pa'i shas mchod nas// bsnyen pa stong byas las rnams 'grub// yul gyi
294b1(rgyud): dngas gsum la// tshogs bdag de yi gzugs byas nas// gnod pa yi ming ldan bcug na// lo nyes mi nges phyug ngas sogs// gang gi mtshan nas bzung ba de// gnod pa kun las srung bar byed//

294b3(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg// tshal ni gnyis su drub ngas dang // yid 'ong rang gi khyim du sgrub// sa ni las kyi dbye bas shes// skyon dang bral bas thab brtsig bya// rgyang sor chad na nyi shu bzhi// de mi ngas
294b4(rgyud): sor bcu gnyis// dpangs ni de yi rgya las ni// bzhi chung bar bskor bar bya// pad+ma'i dbyibs can rgyan bltas nas// ral gri 'bar ba dgrod par bya// zung bzhing rdo rje phyed pa

294b7(rgyud): bsres pa rnams// zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis// sa lunas dang gro dang ni// rgya rtsi che dang nagu la// sa rdza gu gul gur gum bcas// tsam pa zhon dang nye'u shing // me tog gser mdog la sog

296a1(rgyud): dmar po dbang la shis// bsad la khrag dang dug yungs kar// tshe gsum ling kar bcas pa'o// gos dkar rgyar yang dkar po ste// yo byad kun yang dkar byas dang // bsam pa brtsa

296b1(rgyud): dang zhags pa cadra/ kha dog ljang nag rngub cing 'khrug pa/ rin pa che'i brag phug tu gnas pa la dus rtag par rgyun tu mchod nas gru gsum pad kyi dbu su bsams te/ sha dang khrag dang dgu dang gzugs brnyan
296b2(rgyud): rnams zhal du bsregs na myur du 'chi'o// rangs par 'dod pas rnga mo'i rus pa la dza ta ya dze ta ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du srego// lkugs par 'dod na ra'i sha la b+ha tir b+ha ti ra zhes khro tsho gsum sreg go//

296b7(rgyud): shes na// 'ga' las myur du bob byed cing // g.yo 'dod srid la bla ma spu// tshig la sems shing dad mi tshol// bag med g.yeng dang ser sA dang // brkam chen snying rje med pas ni// bskal pa brgya

297a1(rgyud): po kun la byin pas kyang // lad gcig bla ma'i mchod pa yi// brgya yi char yang mi phod do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lnga'i tha drug khris
297a2(rgyud): khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ kye'i rtsa ba'i sems mnga' 'on kyang 'khrugs 'dra zhing // dga' zhing shing tu dag kyang ra ri sna tshogs spras/ lha khams kud la ral gri byar ba'i tshe// lba zin

297b2(rgyud): sdang thams cad zad pa'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang bzhin can// zhe sdang mi g.yo mgon por mdzad// ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag/ sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // rnam dag bsam gtan phrin las

298a1(rgyud): hUM la rgya gram rdo rje gnas// a las chos 'byung grub pa mo// mchod chang ba dra bas// rten pa phyag rgya lnga lnga gnas// mos pa rnam par grub pa yim mos pa nang dag pa'i le'u skyed
298a2(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni// 'khor lo mi bskyod ye shes che// mgrin 'phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung // rna cha gzungs kyis 'od daphrag med// rus pa'i rna rgyad
298a3(rgyud): don yong grub// bal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go// mig la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// rna ba zhe sdang ma zhes grags// sA ni ser sA'i rnam pa bor// lce la phra dog rdo rje ma// lus la rdo rje gti mugo/ yid la chos kyi nga

298a5(rgyud): ba sU tA ra na// snying gi dbus kyi lte ba nyid// phung po lnga yi gtso mo ste// khams dang skye mched lha mor grags// 'byung sgo ba bzhi nyid de// mdom gang gru bzhi lham pa ste// mi g.yo
298a6(rgyud): mgon pa rnam par nges/ lus kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / oM Ar+ya a tsa la ma r+yang ya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ snying po'o// oM Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha bi ba tas pU na/ nye ba'i snying po'o// 
298a7(rgyud): oM tsiN+Da ma hA roSha na hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// oM ha na ma hri swA hA hA bau ShaT he/ hUM hUM ho phaTahaM/ rgyan byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM bang ma bo larga mi ye/ TaM he me Sh+ya/ badz+ra pra ta ka ko la hUM phaT/ shes rab
298a8(rgyud): thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o// ka sA mA ra kha na hi mA ra kha ni sa mA ra ya phaT/ bsad pa'i 'o// sarba a marge me a hUMH/ thun mong grub pa'o// a gad da phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o// swA hA ran+ta/ rgyas pa'i'o// 
298b1(rgyud): d+ham gu da hUM/ dbang gi'o// ka ra ma pu Sha shAn+ti ku ru hUM/ zhi ba'i 'o// sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i rtog pa'i dum bu las khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba 'phags pa mi g.yo// 
298b2(rgyud): ba'i sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// khro bo'i tshogs rnams spros nas ni// gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag
298b3(rgyud): bkang // lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje gshed // g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rta mgrin kha la bsapa par bya// rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yo ba// g.yon par 'dod
298b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'o// dbus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/ dbyig pa sngor po cher 'bar ba// dpus mo g.yon par stobs po che// spyi bor gcugs tong 'khor los bsgyur// gnod mdzes
298b5(rgyud): rgyal po bsam pa ni// rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya// yang ni yab yum sbyor ba las// byang chub sems dpa sprir 'du 'phro las// hUM tshogs khro ma spras nas ni// gcom
298b6(rgyud): shes rab yan lag dgang / lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/ g.yod na gzhan gyis mi bub mo// de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma// gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o// gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas
298b7(rgyud): par// de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma// g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi// phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya// dbus mo g.yas la gnas par yang // sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// g.yon pa
298b8(rgyud): las ni sna tshogs las// spyi bor na mkha'i rdo rje ma// rkang pa gnyis la sa ya ni// sa'i rngan lha mo bzhag par bya// babs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems sprid 'phro 'du las// gdod
299a1(rgyud): nam grub pa'i sangs rgyas rags// rtsu nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod// de dag pan tshum sbyor ba las// rjes chags chen po'i sgra yis na// bdag shegs tshogs rnams
299a2(rgyud): bskus bya ste//  dag lan yod yang gzhug/ os rba khA gtam ru rAg Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba swAhA kanyA// chu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gsal ba lha'i rang bzhed ni/ ku ldang zhal gsum phyag phru
299a3(rgyud): / brjid pa khro ba gang dang bcas/ yang nan pa gcig phyag gnyis par/ rnal 'bur can gyis bsrud par sgom// ngas grub rab mchog zab par 'gyur// dpyir nan tan bskyed par bya// 'phags sa
299a4(rgyud): mi nam pa'i rtog pa las lus kyi dkyil la dang pa'i rim pa le'u suM bzhi pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor du/ rigs kyi khro ba slob ni// thabs btsun
299a5(rgyud): rang sbyong ba las// rnam par 'phrul par bshad bdun/ rang sngags sa parda las byung ba'o// gti mugs dam mnan na// zhal ni gnag dang dgapa ba // 'bang ba'i tshogs kyis
299a6(rgyud): rnam par 'khrigs// shig pa 'khor lo rdo rje rnams// phyag g.yas na bsnams par mdzad// thugs khar bsngags mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa ni// dbang po la sogs bcus dang / 
299a7(rgyud): ma la dang cigs ni dag pa mdzad// bad+man pa mnan nas ni// shar gyi phyog suM bzhugs gyur pa/ rnam sna nga rkyen ldan pa'o// rang sngags sa pan las byung ba'i// sang sna'i mi gamamagon can/ 
299a8(rgyud): ri cer 'thung ldan rje rgyan can// gsar mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spya gsum gsum chen nor bus rgyan// sang dang gnag dang dam ba'i zhal/ mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par
299b1(rgyud): rgyu 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ snying khar bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra su g.yon pa na// g.yon
299b2(rgyud): brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// mi zad bgegs ni skrag mdzad pa// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// lho yi phyogs na bzhugs par gyur// rang sngags yi ge las byung ba'i// 'dod chags mgon po mi g.yo ba// 
299b3(rgyud): gsum pad ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar// zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang // 'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can// dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni
299b4(rgyud): rnam par 'khrug/ pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// snyoms dang bcas pas dril bu dang // dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams// pad+ma nyaM ma la gnas
299b5(rgyud): / phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// klu rnams skrag par mdzad na su/ nub kyi phyog su zhugs par gyur// 8sngags sa bon las byung ba'i// phra dog mi g.yo mgon po na// 
299b6(rgyud): don yod rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// sngo ldang ud pa la mdab ma'i mdog/ zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar// zhal gdangs la ni rnam par 'gyur// gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa// 'bar ba'i 'od
299b7(rgyud): kyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na// bsdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa bsnams// dril bu dgra sta ga yon na bsnams// g.yon brkyang ba yis ga
299b8(rgyud): pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// bgegs chen 'jigs pa gsal mdzad nas// byang gi phyogasu bzhugs par gyur// de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi
300a1(rgyud): tshogs// mthar byed rab tu zad mdzad nas// san yongasu btul byas te// zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
300a2(rgyud): bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA gu h+yan+d+ha/ bod skad du// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gsang rgyud chen po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
300a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'og min gyi gnas na rab tu dgas shing bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzid la snyoms pa
300a4(rgyud): bzhug so// de'i che na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje chos dang / phyag na rdo rje sems bskya dam bag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnod sbyin
300a5(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur la sogs te rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM zhes gsungs te rdo rje khro bos phyogs
300a6(rgyud): mtshams gtam so// srung ba'i don du rab brtson zhing // bgegs kyi sbyor ba brlag par mdzad/ hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he zhes gsungs te rang gi thugs kha nas khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba phyung
300a7(rgyud): g.yas na ral gri g.yon bsdigs mdzub// char sprin lta bur shin tu gnag/ sbrul dang thod pas yang dag rgyan// mi bskyod pas ni byon rlabs shing // bde gshegs 'od zer dpag med 'phros// dngos grub
300a8(rgyud): bde bkun stsol mdzad// oM badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// A li ka li rab sbyor zhing // zla ba rdo rje rab sbyor ldan pas// yang dag rdzogs te mngon sangs rgyas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbusu ni/ 
300b1(rgyud): brkyang ba snam tshul du yang dag gnas// dga' byed ma ni mdur du s+ye// rin chen phreng ma g.ya su dgod// glu mkhan mo ni g.yon du ste// brtson 'grus gar byang rgyab tu gnas// 'gugs byed ma ni shar du ste/ 
300b2(rgyud): rnam para'i chang ma lho ru dgong // gnyis med ma ni nub tu ste// rnam par 'phel ma byang du dgod// 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das yongasu rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen
300b3(rgyud): bo las skyes mchog gi le'u ste dang ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bsrur ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
300b4(rgyud): thugs ka nis 'od zer spros te/ lnga thams cad kyi la 'od zer bim par gyur to// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu rgyan par gyur to// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
300b5(rgyud): dam pa ru// mchod pa'i tshogs ni rnam par bstim/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri nga ro// reg bya lha mo dpag med de// ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag mchod// kye kye mtha' gnyis
300b6(rgyud): rnam par ma g.yos shing // sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro don dpag med mdzad// 'jigs byed chen po 'gro ba kun sgrol zhing // srid pa gsum na dgyes par gar mdzad pa// srong pa'i chu bo skams shing
300b7(rgyud): mi mthun bdud rnams 'joms// srid po'i rlung gis ma g.yas thugs rje mi g.yo mgon// rab brjid mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bsod// bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod pa chen po'i dam tshig/ de nas ya
300b8(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba// rgyal po rtag ldan bod pa ru// lcags kyu lnga sogs bzhag par bya// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor bzhag/ thod pa ru ni yang dag gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi chen po ngas
301a1(rgyud): tshig go// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// tshangs pa brgya byin gshin rje dang // chu bdag gdod sbyin khyab 'jug sogs// me dang srin po rlung gi lha// 'byung pos yi lha mo dang // lAm
301a2(rgyud): yin sogs 'khong bcwal dgug/ oM a kA ra lu kha sarba r+b+ba mASh+Ta sa d+ya ru A.A tra \u0f7fswAhA/ oM ShA waM pa swAhA/ bdud rtsi sha dang khrag la sogs// gang ma thams cad sbyid par bya// phags pa
301a3(rgyud): g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las mngon par rtog pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ro// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du bya// sar pa las
301a4(rgyud): ni bkal nas kyang // dkyil 'khor nyis 'khor ring bu la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bag gangad po// 'khor lo lta bu byas nas kyang // rdo rje phreng bas yongasu bskor// gru bzhir bgyi
301a5(rgyud): zhing bsgo bzhir bgyi// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ dbusu ral gri chen po dgod// shar du rdo rje yang dag dgod// lho ru rin cher phreng ba ste// nub tu chos kyi bo pa ste// byang du rdo
301a6(rgyud): gsu mo// sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu mkhas pas bzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dam tshig go// de nas char pa mi 'bab na// sngags bu gru
301a7(rgyud): bzhi'i steng du yang // dngul gyi gtong ba bzhag nas kyang // bag zan las mi byas pa'i gzugs// pad+ma sum rtseg dag tu bya// seng du k+Sha yi gzugs bzhag la// gur gum gyis ni blugs byas la// mtsham
301a8(rgyud): su oM dang ba bkod de/ can dad dkar pos sbyir sreg bya// kha dog mang po sbyor ldan pas// klu yi gzugs ni nges par dgug/ des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// kham pa'i gab tshe dkar po ru// pra yang
301b1(rgyud): ku mo khu ba yis// ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo dro// rgya mtsho ngos las sa blangs la// klu yi gzugs ni mngon byas te/ na mkha' lding gi khu bas byugs// til mar la ni sbyin sreg bya// de nas yang dag
301b2(rgyud): bshad bya ba/ kham por ser po'i nang du ni// bsgrub pa gzugs gzhug ldong ros kyis// ri rab rtse mo brgyad pa bri// des ni yang dag gnas par bya// shin tu rno ba'i lcags dag la// khru do ched kyi ral gri bya/ 
301b3(rgyud): maN+Dal dkar po'i steng du bzhag/ zla ba drug ni rig pa bzlas// til mar gyis ni bskus byas nas// zla ba gzas zin chen sgrub// thogs pas mkha' la lding bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha sA lnga// grib
301b4(rgyud): ma ngag la bskams pas te// ljags gsum dag gis dkris byas te// shar bltas zas ni bsrung bar gnas// gzas zim tshen khang gzhug bya// mnyam par gzhag ste sau shu zlas// khar
301b5(rgyud): bcug gzhan gyis mngon mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'ang sa dngos grub chen pa'i dmachogo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ga/ sa bzhi dkar la zlum pa la// tsan ngan dkar po'i me swAr te/ sa
301b6(rgyud): sku'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// nyungs kar gyis ni sbyin sreg bya// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob// til nag pos ni sngor sreg bya// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// 
301b7(rgyud): ngur ba'i myu gus spyod sreg bya// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur// seng ldeng dag la phur bus bya// gsang sngags nyi shu gcig bzlas nas// 'dod pa'i gzugs la dbab par bya// dgyes pas dngas
301b8(rgyud): grub ster bar 'gyur// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yongasu dgyes nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa
302a1(rgyud): rnams la rnam par gzigs nas/ oM AHhUM bya ba'i sgra gsungs te ma snang bar gyur to// de ras rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs kyis rang gi bdag pa ma'ang bar ma gyur te/ phyogs tsha
302a2(rgyud): nas mngon du phyogs nas 'di yis gsol ba btab bo// e ma bcom ldan ngo mtshar che// stong pa'i ngang la tsaM ste bzhugs// bdag ni chings spyod byams pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa kun nas spong // e ma
302a3(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i sku// tshig kun gyis nim spros pa// bdag ni rjes chags snying rje che// 'gro ba yang dag sgrol bar mdzad// e ma dri med dag pa'i sku// sdong po'i ngangal ma bzhugs par// rab tu dag pas
302a4(rgyud): bdag la rol// 'gro ba'i ngan la rdzas chags brjod/ ma'i dang kun grub mdzad pa// dag pa'i ye shes dri med sku// gags 'gro kur bzung ba'i phyir// gsob kyad ni yang dag pa
302a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dgyes bsku yongasu gas par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs oM Ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+na
302a6(rgyud): ban+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ gsang sngags dang pur bu'i sngag so// oM na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM hU traT hUM/ me be haM ma tra T+Ta hUM ma ma hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ shin tu rno ba'i sngags te las ba
302a7(rgyud): ba'o// de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi don khong du chud par gyur to// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo
302a8(rgyud): ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra a mri ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa
302b1(rgyud): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i pad+ma la bzhug so// gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i khang pa na// mA ma ki nga
302b2(rgyud): babs gcig tu// bcom ldan rdo rje can rol te// gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog/ sngon du lnga khyod kyi gsungs pa// bdud rtsi yi ni sgrubs pa'i babs// bde ba chen pos@
302b3(rgyud): stsal pa// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes bshad// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bsam med zad med phra mo ste// don yod dbang po las 'das pa// dam pa zhi pa rnam dag pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod pa yin// de nas
302b4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje yis// mA ma kir chags dang ldan nas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang chen mngon sum du ni ma // rgyud rnams kun la gsung ba yi// ye shes rdo rje bdu
302b5(rgyud): mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// brtan por khyud dang 'od byed dang // dga' ba'i rol las mnyam sbyor dang // d+yangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi
302b6(rgyud): mchog/ de ltar myur du 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te// 'gro ba gsum ni nges bskyed ngo // khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma// de yi sgrub pa bdag gis bshad// nyod cig ngo sa sem
302b7(rgyud): kyis tshig/ mdong bsdus nas shing bshad par bya// sems can don du phan dod du// sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog/ rnal 'byor gang gis shes gyur na// 'khor ba'i bcings las sgyur bar grol// bsnga
302b8(rgyud): bu med cing ye shes che// dngos grub 'jig rten gsum sgrub bo// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// sgrub pa pos ni bde ba spyod// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje 'dud ci phyung bar bya// b+ha ga'i bad+mang / 
303a1(rgyud): 'o ba ba ste// rdo rje pang zer mA ma kis 'o btab// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab pas// de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des// rdo rje bdud rtsi las rgya
303a2(rgyud): ba'i// nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis ni// mchod pa dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// 'dir ni mchod pa dza ltar te// de bzhi dkyil 'khor ji ldang lags// ga' ba
303a3(rgyud): po pob dga' ba// rab tu dgyes nas bka' stsal 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// ngo btab pas ri dgar 'gyur te// bzhad ras 'di skad bka' stsal te// sku gsung thugs
303a4(rgyud): kyi sgrub dor dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrub pa'i phyir// 8rab chen po sbyong ba yis// mA ma kIs ni 'di dris pa// zur ba/ sum dkyil 'khor bris na su// gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma ki/ nang
303a5(rgyud): snying ba dang ldan pa'i// pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ni bya// de dbusagasang chen rig ma dang // gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ dang bo'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yas pa la ni dkar po 'dong / 
303a6(rgyud): g.yon du dmar por rab gsungs te// lha yi rgyad gyis brgyan byas pa// lha yid bza' me tog phreng // lha yaM tri yos byug byed pa// lha yi dngos grub bya zhib// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// phyi rol du
303a7(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor mang // sgo bzhi pa na rab tu brtags// shar dublo gnyer ma bzhag ste// lho na 'jigs par 'jigs byeng ma// dub naHyi gzugs can ma// byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo// mkhas pas
303a8(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rig ma brgyad ni mnyam par bri// mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i zhal// bla mo dang ni dung can mo// ri bongar 'dzin dang dkyil 'khor mo// ri bong 'dzin ri mo yid dga'// yid la bde bar byes
303b1(rgyud): dag/ rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni yid dga' ma// phyogs rnams dang ni mtshams ngag la// rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya// mchod pa pi wang rnga ba
303b2(rgyud): de bzhin spos dang me tog sogs// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa ni// dga' ba rol pa sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma dang bran mo bu mo dang // sring mo ga
303b3(rgyud): mo de bzhin te// rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag las// blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// ma lus bdud rtsi blangs pas ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur// sring mo nad med na so gzhon// bu mo yi ni 'ad
303b4(rgyud): kun spyir// bram zer mo'i ni dod yod grub// gsang ba'i rgya la 'khor la 'dod byas// lce ni dril bar byas nasu// kha yis pad+ma blang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nas myur bar dngos grub bo// 
303b5(rgyud): bung ba rtse ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyod// 'dus dang grub mo dang brkyang ba// yar bteg zer ni / na tu brkyang // byeng ba'i bcing ba sbyor ba yis// sa gsum dag
303b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// sha chen dang ni khrag chen gyis// de bzhin bshang gci khu ba dag/ de dag rdo rje bdud rtsi lnga// nyin dang nyin du bsgrub par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// gal te dngos grub bdag 'dod na// da yis
303b7(rgyud): dor rnams thad ni// sgrub pa pos ni mchog tu sgrub// dbang dang dgug dang 'bab pa dang // gsong dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi bang chen pos// bya ba thams cad kun tu bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi ba
303b8(rgyud): cher po/ bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed
304a1(rgyud): mngon tshul bstad pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de ngas mgu ba'i lha mo // pad+ma rgyas pa'i mA ma ki/ brtan po 'khyud pa byas nasu// dbang po thams cad la 'o bta/ 
304a2(rgyud): mchu sos bzung 'o btab ste// srid sgra sngags ni brjod par bya// rdo rje bcings pas sku yang 'dzin// rdo rje can gyis gsang byas te// pad+ma rdo rje bcug nasu// chags na dga' ste 'dod par bya// sing sA
304a3(rgyud): snyan po sgra rnams dang // ko ki la dang gling bu sogs// lha mo mA ma kI dang rtse// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen pos// nu ma zung la gzir byas te// sen mo ra mos gdab par bya// de yang gos ri phung byas te// seng
304a4(rgyud): 'og la yang blta bar bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma 'o btab nas/ dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI/ lha ma na mo legaso legs// gtan du 'dod la chags pa yis// bdag
304a5(rgyud): gis khyod la dga' bar bya// gang zhig 'dod pa khyod skye sa zhus/ khyod la bdag gis mchog tu sbyin// de nas lha mo ma ma kI/ tshig 'di dag ni ched du gsol// bcom ldan nyid kyis
304a6(rgyud): de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam sprul pa// phra bas shin tu phra ba yis// zang med ye shes ji lta rol// nga 'dra lha yis dmyong ba mo// dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas// de dag bcom
304a7(rgyud): 'byung bas na// bdag ni ngo mtshar dam par gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen bshad// nyon cig de nyid mA ma kI// ye shes sbyor ba 'bigs byed pa// shin tu phra ba gas
304a8(rgyud): chen po// ye shes shes bya ngo bo nyid// nga ni bdagro gis bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rangab sgrub pa// mi 'jigs zad med rtag pa ni// gdong ma med cing dbang po spangs// yod nyid dang ni med
304b1(rgyud): nyid kyang / dbang po dang bcas dbang po med // 'byung ba kun tu ma mthong ba// sbyong ba lam gyis mthong ba'o// sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// phyi nang nang du bcas pa'o// phyi ni gzugs kyi phung po sog/ 
304b2(rgyud): 'byung ba rnam pa kun rdzob ste// sna tshogs g.yo dang mi g.yo ba// khams gsum dang ni ma lus par// de gcig pos ni khyab pa ste// thams cad rnam shes kho na'o// ci phyir sen bdag med rnams// 
304b3(rgyud): nam shes phung po rten pa yin// blun sems snyigs ma'i mi rnams kyis// 'ga' yang shes pa ma yin na// sems las ma byung sems kyi ngos// ye shes shes bya ngo bo nyid// thams cad rnam
304b4(rgyud): shes gcig nyid do// gang tshe lus la rkyen nyid 'gyur chos rnams dang ni chos gcig 'gyur// dngos po bdag ni che 'gyur// ci yi phyir na chos rnams kyi// mang po nyid du chos rnams
304b5(rgyud): kyang // chu rgyud bzhin du rgya mtsho la// bar ba ni gcog kho na ste// mang po nyid du mi snyed de// ci ltar nang du cher ban sa pa// bla ma'i zhal kho na las thog// b+ha ga'i pad+mar dma'a'
304b6(rgyud): gang // na mkha' lnga na rgyan pa ste// snying dang snying po rnam ldan zhing // 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par klubs// de dbus rdo rje can bzhugs te// byang sems bdud rtsi dang ldan pa// cha shas chas min
304b7(rgyud): rnam grol bar// thig la de yis rnam par spangs// des gnas rtag tu zag pa ni// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi gzugs/ khams rnams kun gyi gzhi yin pa// steng 'og tu yang rnam par byab
304b8(rgyud): des ni mthong ba bos pa yang // mnams pa dang ni myang ba yang // rog dang bde ba'i long spyad do// zas dang me tog phreng ba dang // rgyan dang gos kyi brgyan pa ste// dag gis sna tshogs grags pa yang / 
305a1(rgyud): blangs pa dang ni bzung ba rnams// rol dang kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang // sad pa dang ni log pa dang // thams cad rmi lam mthong ba ste// bzhad dang de bzhin
305a2(rgyud): chod dang // shin tu yid 'phrog gar dang ni// rnga rnams dag kyang brdung ba ste// sna tshogs pa dag 'dir brjod pas/ smon pa dang ni myos pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dod chags de de nyid// gzugs med mang
305a3(rgyud): po'i gzugs can de// pho dang mo dang ma ning rnams// du ma'i gzugs tsan kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs ni nor bu bzhin// khyab pa'i dngos kyis khyab na su// de nyid dam pa char gan so// de bzhin
305a4(rgyud): nyid de mA ma kI// bzlas meng 'dzin pa yang med de// bgrang phreng bya ba 'ga' yang med// bas spangs pa yang mi bya'o// / b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod byas te// mkhas pas bdud rtsi bza' brang
305a5(rgyud): bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// de mis de nyid 'grub pa// gang de bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i rtsa// b+ha ga'i dbu su pad+ma ste/ rtsag nar sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ de yi dbu su de gtso ste// de dag
305a6(rgyud): las gzhan shin tu mchog/ rtsa dag dgu ni rnam par gnas// sgo dgu la gnas rigs pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lha mo// rtag tu rdo rje can mnyam blta// 
305a7(rgyud): bas de dag rab byed na// chags bral zhes gsungs kun rig pas/ de dag gsang tshan mchog rab ni// zhal bzang ma kye sbyor bar bshad// sna tshogs rnam snang mdzad sogs pa// de bzhin
305a8(rgyud): gshegs pas mi shes te// gtan du dga' ba'i yod bde ba// sbyor bas dam pa rab bstan to// gsang ba'i pad+ma mthong nas dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i mA ma kI/ rdo rje'i bdud rtsi bde ba che// de nyid bdag
305b1(rgyud): gis bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po yis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin nyid sbyor ba ye shes bstan
305b2(rgyud): pa ces bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de ras mgu ba'i lha mo des// hA ra na pur gyis brgyan te// 'di dag dbyangs ni blangs na su// sems dpa' chen po dgyes par byed // phyung mdzad
305b3(rgyud): bde chen rdo rje las// bdag gis mchog gi yig 'bru 'tshal bar bgyi// b+ha ga'i pad+mar bde ba chen po ste// rdo rje'i don de bde ba chen po lags// sa 'jid pa dang skad phran dang // drug ldan la sogs
305b4(rgyud): mtha' khob tshul// sna tshogs phung pong rngam dag gi/ smad pa'i sgra yis blang bar bya// de rnams dbyangs dag blangs nas su// dga' ba yang bde rnams sbrul gyis// rdo rje bdud rtsi ba
305b5(rgyud): ba che// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsa la pa// de bzhin nyid kyis bcom bcang // rdo rje can khyod bka' dror gyis// rtag par ye shes
305b6(rgyud): bya ba bgyi// bcom ldan chags pa dang bral ba'i// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba 'angadi // rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba yi// sbyor ba bdag gis bstan par bgyi// da dung bdag la the tshom mchis// phyag rgya gnyis kyi rna
305b7(rgyud): sprul pa// ji ltar phyag rgya yang dag 'byung // de dag gi sngags ji ltar lags// sngags rnams gang las skye ba lags// khyad par du ri lha rnams kyang // lha ni dag bcopa na// mdor bsdus nas
305b8(rgyud): ni bdag la gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi ba chen pos// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'di gsungs// phyag rgya sngags dag 'byung ba ni// bshad de nyod cig pA ma kI/ phyag rgya dam pa gsub gsungs te// 
306a1(rgyud): sku dang gsung rang thugs las 'byung // sku ni phyag rgya mchog 'gyur te// gsungs ni phyag rgya sngags kyi las// thugs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni// bsam gtar ri mo gnyis
306a2(rgyud): med gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen la// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi bri'o// phyag rgya mngon sum gzugs yin te/ lha ni lha mo bud med do// dbang po thams cad bde ba ru
306a3(rgyud): b+ha ga'i pad+mar mchod par bya// rdo rje'i pad+ma mnyam sbyor zhing // las thams cad ni 'grub par bya// ji ltar dpag bsam shing cher gyi// yan lag brgya phrag stong can dang // rtsa dang de la gzung ba ni/ 
306a4(rgyud): skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar bdud rtsi'i 'bababa'i rtsa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i yum yin te// sngags 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni// b+ha ga'i dbusu gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje
306a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dud rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje bcug nas mA ma ki/ nyon cig sngags rnams mtshan nyid ni// dang po rnam snang mdzad sbyor te// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA su kha// sa bon bzhi dang ma'am ldan la/ swA hA mi
306a6(rgyud): yang sbyor ro// rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul te// yi ge gnyis dang bzhi pa ste// zin pa yis ni mnyam ldan pa/ mA ma kA yi snying po'i mchog/ brgyad dag kho na'o dbus pa gang // brgyad la rgyan gyis rnam par
306a7(rgyud): brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni sbyar byas te// lha mo sngags kyis sngags phyung ngo // sgo srung dag gi sngags rnams ni/ nyon cig skal bzang mA ma kI// sde yi ba ma sngags byung ste// sa bar brgyad ni sngags
306a8(rgyud): pas/ stong ba'i lha yis gnon byas te// rnam par snang mdzad dang ldan la// swA hA yi ge mnyam por ldan// dngos grub thang rab sbyin rnams// bzhi ni sgo srung gyi yin te// bzhi ni spos dang puSh+pe sogs// ma dang
306b1(rgyud): yi ge ga bzhi la// swA hA rnam par snang mdzad yang // lha mo gsang ba'i mA ma ki/ rdza sogs kun gyis mchod par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
306b2(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las sngags byung ba'i rim pa bstan pa ces bya ba le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas sbyin sreg las ngag gi/ 
306b3(rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga yis// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'bab dang bskrad kyang de bzhid du// / sngags dang
306b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i sgrub pa rnams// dkun bdag gis bshang bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying byeng pa// skur brten bcas pas gnyis gnas nas// rgyan thams cad kyis
306b5(rgyud): brgyan byas te// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas// rkang gnyis g.yas brkyang bya ba dang // g.yon brkyang bya ba yang byas te// rkang mnyam
306b6(rgyud): dang ni sa ga yi// sa ni spyod par byed ma thag/ sa la reg na 'jam skye'o// de nas 'gegs rnams skad nasu// gzhal khas sprul pa la sogs pa/ gong du bla ma phyag 'tsha lo// phyi nas sa yi lha mo
306b7(rgyud): dgug/ oM e h+ye hi lha mche// sa yi brtan ma 'jig rten yumo// rin chen thams cad rab rdzogs pa'o// lha mi rgyan gyis brgyan byed pa/ har d+hu bur smra 'byin ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu mtshad/ 
306b8(rgyud): 'di dag ni bzhes nasu/ sbyin sreg las ni 'grub par mdzod// hri hri hri hA swA hA// bshang gci khrag dang khu ba yis/ dkyil 'khor sa la gtong bar bya// byin rlabs bya ba'i phyir spos ni// sha chen gyis ni
307a1(rgyud): dbul par bya// de nas rig ma 'jug byas te// gdal pa ma nga sme sham// garang mkhan ma dang bram che mo// de kho na bzhid rgyal mo dang // dbangs rigs po dang rgyal rigs mo// 
307a2(rgyud): dring sros kyi mchong byas te// lnga mi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// yang lag lnga la yi ge hriM/ b+haga'i dbus su yi ge drum// sbyar ma sgrol ma gos dkar ma/ yi dpa'am bdag bsgom par bya/ 
307a3(rgyud): b+ha ga'i dbus su slob dpon gyis// me tog gtor ba kho nar bya// de nas sngags pas ho lung ni/ chad mar kun tu bri bya ste// zhi la zlum por bya ba ste// khru gang tsam du big gdab po// khru phyangs la
307a4(rgyud): banas nas su// dkar rtsi tshon gyis byug par bri/ kun tu 'khor lo tshur ltar yang // glo ru mnyam par bri ba'o// rgyas pal ni khA dza ste// de la khru gang brko bar bya// gru bon pan
307a5(rgyud): maba' mnyam du// mugs dang bcug gas briba'o// mngon spyod la ni zung gsum ste// sor nyi shu ri yangs pa'i cang// oM shu byad mi 'ad byas na// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ya
307a6(rgyud): 'bar ba phreng gis 'khrug pa bri// de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la// zla gam yang dag bri ba'o// ho khung yang dag ston nas su// phyogs kyi cha yang bstan par bya// byang du mngon du kha gyur te// sngags
307a7(rgyud): bas zhi ba brtsam par bya// rgyas pa la ni shar du yang // mngon spyod la ni lho na su// dbang ni nub du kho na bshad// dgug dang bskrad kyang de bzhin no// mngon spyong rtog par nag po ste// chen lnga yis
307a8(rgyud): ni dbang sogs bya// 'bras dang til dang 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig par// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// zhi ba rgyas pa spyir sreg bya// sreg shing rnams kyang thams cad la// dri
307b1(rgyud): zhim 'om can shing ngo // sna tshogs pas sam gtor ma yang / 'byung ba thams cad sbyin par bya// gtor ma dang yang sgrub pa pos// khrag 'thung phyag rgya chen pos sbyin// gang zhig yid kyis
307b2(rgyud): 'dod pa na// rtag tu rnal bzung pa mos 'grul// dbyar byas dus na zhi ba ste// rgyas pa ro bzhin dgun gyi dus// spyod ka mngon spyod las rnams no// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad bya// @#
307b3(rgyud): duzhi pa rab tu gsungs// rgyas pa de bzhin srod la ste// nyin phyed la 'am na ma phyed la// rtag par mdzar spyod bya ba'o// hom khung dbus su yi ngag lha// yi ge hUM gis skyes nas su
307b4(rgyud): zhal ni gdangs pa bsam byas te// sbyin sreg de la dbul bar bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag 'bul 'gyuran// mdun du mngon sum kho nar 'gyur// dang po me na
307b5(rgyud): dgug bya ba// lha thams cad kyi mtshang ba'i gnas// 'od zer phreng 'khrigs drag po lnga// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'o// oM sa rkye hi/ 'dir gshegs gan
307b6(rgyud): mi za zar khyong // mo lnga mngon sum dngos grub sbyin// drag po khams gsum gyis mchod pa// khyab 'jug tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba// 'di dag yon yang bzhes nas su// zhabs g.yon
307b7(rgyud): brjes kyang can// oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA// dang po la ni mon 'phrul te// phyi nas lnga bshos me togang bul// oM lnga'i me tog shim tu mar // dri zhim shin tu mdzes pa ni// 
307b8(rgyud): tog de ring bzhes na su// 'o la byin gyis brlab par gsol// hUM me tog gi sngag so// oM mar me 'ong zer 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro 'jigs pa 'joms byed pa// lA yi mig byed bkra
308a1(rgyud): shis pas/ mar ma khyod kyis bzhes gsol// hUM mar me'i sngag so// oM tsan+d+ra gagra pur dang bcas pa'i// dri zhim spos ma dge ba ni// mthu dang bcas par bya ba 'di
308a2(rgyud): nas byin gyis brlab du gsol// hUM spos kyi sngag so// oM sna tshogs lha yi dri zhim pa// sna tshogs ga pur rnam rgyan pas// sna tshogs yi ge hUM las byung // dri 'di 'bul te bzhe sa
308a3(rgyud): gsol// hUM dri'i sngagaso// dang por mchod pa'i cho ga ni// be tsom med par me la bya// phyi ras rang gi yi dam lha'i// bzlas sngags rig par brjod par bya// dbyangs dang gar dang zas rnam
308a4(rgyud): kyis// rnam pa du mar rol byas te// rig pa dang ni sgrub pa pos// tshogs la mchod pas mnyes par bya// gal te dngos grub dag 'dod na// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub pa'o// bla ma
308a5(rgyud): ma lha rdo rje 'dzin/ mchod par byas nas rdzog sa bar// oM me lha las ni grub par mdzad// son thang bde ba 'a dzan// sku gsung thugs dngos grub dor du// lha rnams lnga
308a6(rgyud): ni rjesu skyobs// me lha zhi bar gshegs nas// sa gzhi zhi bar mdzad mdzod cig rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa yis// sgrub pa po dang bde dang // beng gi bsod nams 'bras 'gyur dang // sngag
308a7(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rab sbyin cig/ a A/ i I u A re r-I l-i l-I/ e aM/ oM ai/ e aHhUM swA hA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungaso// de bzhin gshegs pa
308a8(rgyud): ba kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi bde bo chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// khyod la mig sman ba
308b1(rgyud): ba bya// tshal chen gyi ni snying po yi// banang la ni drang pa blangs// 'ug pa'i mgo bsreg nasu// khrag chen dang ni bsres par byas// mtshan mo la ni btags nasu// zhib mor phye mar
308b2(rgyud): nar bya// bya rgod rje re bkang nasu/ mi yi rus pa'i thur mang gos// mig la bskus nas gzugs kun gyi// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yi byed// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'o// mig sman
308b3(rgyud): dngos grub sbyor ba ni// nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/ b+ha ga'i dbusu bsgrub par bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dgugs las byed// sna tshogs drag po'i gdon rnam
308b4(rgyud): dang / zhag bzhi pa yi rims dang dug thang med pa rabyeng lha mo// dga' mo khyod la bden par bshad// rgyal po'i kha ban chen por mchod// dgra de rnams kyang zad byed do// 
308b5(rgyud): bzhin gegs dang 'gag par byang // smin sman lnga/ na por bzla bar bya// oM 'dod pa'i gzugs can mag yangs ma/ bshang gci khrag la dga' byed ma// zhal gsum phyag
308b6(rgyud): drug pa'i lha mo/ dag pa'i gzugs can mA ma ka~M/ hriM hra hA hUM/ e eHoM ha he swAhA/ dang ba'i zhal ni nag po ste/ nga kho na bzhin g.yas ni dgang// g.yon ni dmar por de rig nas/ g.yas
308b7(rgyud): phyogs ral gri 'khor lo tsam// g.yon du zhags pa dang lcags kyu// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu yang / b+ha ga'i dbus sgom byas te// nga la mig sman bsgrub par bya// b+ha ga gur gum gyi bkang
308b8(rgyud): nas// phyin ling ga gzhug par bya// de la brjod par bya sngags ni// oM yig sgra yig phye ba dang // badz+ra a mri ta zhes bya'o// sgra sgrog sprin dang phaT yig// bdud rtsi dang ni mnyam ldan pa/ 
309a1(rgyud): b+ha ga'i dbus nas dbyung bar bya// de la sngags 'bum bzlas nasu// de yis thig la kho nar bya// bud med kyis khyo 'khol 'gyur te// mdun sa don bcas
309a2(rgyud): rgyal po yang // skyes pa gang gis de byas na// bud med gang la skal can 'gyur// rgyal po khab can chen por chod// dag po rnams ni zad byedo// du dur a na'i 'bras blangs te// bad ci
309a3(rgyud): dang ni bsrel byas nas// zhal gsum drag po'i gzugs dang ni// gshin rje gshar khro bzlas nasu// sha chen dang ni ldan byas te// chang dang bsres la sbyin par bye// rtag tu myos nas 'khor na
309a4(rgyud): ma mo bskam nos shi 'gyur// a hrIHSh+T+rI wa kritA nan sarba sha trUn+d+ha sha ya/ stam b+ha ya mA ra ya hUM hUM gag/ sngags bas gi'u wang blangs mab+ha ga la ni yog 'brugyi can+da gyis
309a5(rgyud): ni mnyam byugs nas/ khyod dang lhan cig gnas par bya// gnas ma dag ni bde chen te// 'khor g.yog dngos por 'gyurapa'o// bshang gci gzugs brnyan byas na su// sha chen gyis
309a6(rgyud): ni spos dbul te// dag yi skra yis dkris byas nas// rus pa'i phye mas byug par bya// dgra sgor brkos nas sbas byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni shi 'gyuro// bshang gtso khrag dang bsres pa
309a7(rgyud): yi/ sha chen gyis ni sbyin sreg bya// dur khrod kyi ni sreg shing yang // shing gcag po dang la mdo ma// me yi hom khung bris nas// nyid phyid nam phyed sbyin sreg bya/ khro chen gshin rje'i gshed pa
309a8(rgyud): yi/ sku la tha bas bskus pas mi/ bsgoms nas dgra la cher gnon na// gdon mi za bar shi 'gyuraro// rdo bdud rtsi bde chen pos// bco ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa bde
309b1(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las las chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u lnga pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen las
309b2(rgyud): dang ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// sgrub pa mdor bsdus bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yang // de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes/ khams gsum rnam rgya las byung yin// gru bzhi
309b3(rgyud): par ni thig gdab ste// grwa gang yang na khru do'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa la// dpa ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad bzhag/ zhal gsum de bzhin phyag drug ste/ 
309b4(rgyud): rgyan tha~Md kyis yongs rdzogs pa/ phyag rgya yis ni phyag rgyan pa// rig ma bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa/ u mI sras pa'i nu mar bzhugs// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po khro dang ldan par
309b5(rgyud): bzhad byed zhal// g.yas pa la ni mda' bris te// de kho na bzhan g.yon na gzhu// phyag bzhi pa ni bris pa la/ phya gnyis pas ni nu mar bsnams// rigs thaMd zhal sa
309b6(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin sgo srung lcags kyu dang / de bzhin me tog spos med ma// dri yang yang dag bri bar bya// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin dbyangs// gar mkhan ma yang phyag drug nyid // de bzhin gling bu ma bri ste/ pi wang ma dang
309b7(rgyud): chen ma/ rdza rdza ma dang sil snyen kun/ dkyil 'khor la ni bri ba'o// rdo rje bdung rtsi rgyud chen las/ skal pa bzang po yang bzhag ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ bzang po dag kho na'o// rgyu
309b8(rgyud): ni thaMd kyis brgyan pa sgrub pa po yang mdun dri'o// bgrang phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang // dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya// gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod rdzas dang // chang skyems ro dang dga' ston mchod// nag pa
310a1(rgyud): brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// dkyil 'khor la ni rdul tshon gdab// dab spu gru bzhi bri ba'o// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sngags yi gcig pa gtso bo ni/ rdo rje hUM ma
310a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa bdag gas rgyal srid dbang nyid ngam// bran me ba m+bi de bzhin dum dang sring mo dbul bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi// ngos grub ga
310a3(rgyud): bdag 'dod na/ khams gsum rnam rgya las byung ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sanga'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung // bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pa// ngan song ba
310a4(rgyud): meng byed pa// rdo rje sel gol mnyam sbyor gyis// dang ldan rdo rje duhUM mdzad 'grub// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ byang sems rnar sprul par gsungs// lan grangs dmar
310a5(rgyud): ma dang // dkyil 'khor du ni rol par bya// b+ha gi'i nga bus la myang byas pa// gang dag dpa' bo sngags la gnas// pad+maR+sha kha yis 'o byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba kho nar blang // lag pa
310a6(rgyud): yi ni sor mo la// gnas de la ni blang mi bya// blang bar gyur na 'jigs 'gyur nas// mthu'ang 'jigs nas 'brasdu med// rig ma chen mos kyang phyung nas/ rdo rje la yang 'o gang po// de ni sangs
310a7(rgyud): nyid 'grub khru ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi
310a8(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bsgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o// / de nas lha mo mA ma ki/ dga' ba'i rol par cher bzhugs
310b1(rgyud): pas// thal mo sbyar naso// dbyings 'di dag ni ched du brjod// dpa' bo chu skyes sngon pa'i sku// dpa' bo gzhan gyis yongs bskor zhing // phyag rgya ma tshags mnyam ldan par/ 
310b2(rgyud): bdud dri bdag phyag 'tshal// ston gyi na mkha' dang 'dra ba// nga ro bung ba smre sgrogs ltar khe rgal bar bzhugs pa skal bzang ba/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// bang mkhyen
310b3(rgyud): bzang mdzes// yang dag dbang po lam gyis ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ma lus pa yi khams gsum la// rdo rje bdud rtsi dpe med pas// nyi shu rtsa bani rigs tshon
310b4(rgyud): shin tu chags pas dga' byed pa// sen mo rjes dang bcas pa'i sku// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal// ud pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bur phyag sngo ba// sangs rgyas de ban
310b5(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje khyod kyis bdag dang ni// shin tu dga' ba'i rje su chags pas long sprang cig/ khams ga/ sum la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/ khyod ni skyon ma
310b6(rgyud): dam pa'i stong pa las/ yig 'brus rdo rjes gyur pa'i mgron po khyod// rgyu dang mi rgyu gang gis khyod mthong nas/ de dag 'khor ba ru ni ga la 'gro// de ltar dbyangs ni blangs na su// rdo rje ga
310b7(rgyud): ni nar byed// rkang pa dang ni rkang pa dang // dpung pa dang ni mgo bo'i gar// gar gyi gzhung gi mtshan nyid// rjes thabs rjesu rim pa stong pa dang 'gying bag ste// rgyas dang 'dud dang gsal po ru/ 
310b8(rgyud): rgyas pa dang ni smin bskyod gar// lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// stabs brgyad kyis ni gar byed pa// rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma ki/ gar byas nas ni lha mo das// rdo rje cing gis rje ni/ rdo rje ba tshon 'os
311a1(rgyud): byed/ de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes kyang // 'o btab mA ma kI pad+mar// ston cig lha mo pad+ma ni// de la mchod pa brtsam par bya// bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo/ 
311a2(rgyud): rtsi bsam gtan brtsam par bgyi// de bzhin nyid mchog brtsam pa ni// bdud rtsi thig le'i gzugs can ste/ mkha' yi dbusu zla ba 'dra// spong pa de nyid ched du brjod// 'jigs med zad mang pra
311a3(rgyud): mo ni// rdo rje sems dpa' 'joms byed pa// lte ba'i dbu su gnas lha mo// snying po gsang ba'i spyod yul la// khu ba'i gzugs kyis zags nasu// b+ha ga ling ga'i dkyil du gnas// 'di na
311a4(rgyud): srog chags kyi ni srog/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po brten// sangs rgyas de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// sa nga chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' khon
311a5(rgyud): yang // g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs pa'i// khams ga sum la ni ma lus par// de ni bdag gis rtag tu bsam// de las skyed de bdag dang khyod// tshangs pa lha dbang khyab 'jug sogs/ 
311a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// shes bya shes pa'i bdag nyid gtso// de nyid dam pa de bsam mo// skye ba dang ni shi ba dang // thams cad de la 'dus pa yin// skyed po byed pa po de gcig/ ra
311a7(rgyud): bdag gyur pa lhan cig pa// bde mkhyen pa kun nas kun// zhi nas zhi ba khyab pa po// ci phyir khang pa de bkang bas// bde bas skyes bun bshad pa yin// lus la gnas phyir lus can te// shed byed bying
311a8(rgyud): na shes par 'dod// bdag la bdag gis rig pa'i lha// de phyir lha zhes 'dod pa yin// 'jug las khyab 'jug ces gsungs te// ngag gis rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur// sngon du med pa gsang ba 'di// 
311b1(rgyud): nan tan du ni gsang bar bya// smon can mon dang g.yon can min// dam tshig la ni mi snang ba// chad par lta ba med pa la// bla ma la chags 'dul ba can// phrag dog chags pa spong byed pa/ dkyil
311b2(rgyud): 'khor la ni zhugs pa dang // rdo rje bstan pa'i slob ma dag/ de la rgyas pa'i bstan pa 'di// de bzhin nyid mchog bshad par bya// slob dpon rig ma dang ldan nas// de la dbang bskur smin par bya// rdo rje bdud
311b3(rgyud): rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po'i rdo rje bdud ci rgyud chen po las dbyangs dang / gar
311b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang / de bzhin nyid cher dmigs pa dag bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas lha mo yang langs nas// bzhad nas 'di dag zhu ba ste/ 
311b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'di la the tsom zos// dam pa'i ngo mtshar ba dag bskyed de// zhi gzugs rdo rje can de las// khro bo'i gzug sa ni tso ltar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ rdo rje
311b6(rgyud): rtsi bde chen pos// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te// khro bo'i gzugs ni rnam par byung / 'bang ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po can// 'jigs byed la yang 'dzegs par byed// zhal bzhi la ni phyag brgya
311b7(rgyud): bong ba'i dbu rgyan 'jigs par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bsnams te// 'ong ba dang ni khrag dga' nga // gtum po rgyu ma'i phreng 'khrugs pa// rig ma brgyad kyis yongasu bskor// phu khrod chen
311b8(rgyud): bzhir bzhugs pa// phaT yig sngags kyi nga ro tsan// 'byung po ro langs tshogs pa dang // dur khrod la ni rol mdzad pas// de 'og dbang dang bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ 
312a1(rgyud): gza' byed rdo rje can chen mo// dpal ldan khrag 'bung gzugs ni phyung / dang po'i rig ma'i 'jigs can ma// mi sdug gdol pa sme sha can// ser mo rigs can
312a2(rgyud): drag mo dang // 'jigs par byed ma brgyad du 'dod// sngags 'di dag gi brla byas te// gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo // 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs// sgyu ma phreng gi rgyan skung brgyan// sha chen
312a3(rgyud): ngag ni gsol byed pa// dpal ldan khrag 'bung bdag phyag 'tshal// sgrub pa po rnams phan byed phyir// bzlas pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'dud pa ya~M ro bzhi pa spyong/ 
312a4(rgyud): bdun pa yi yang gsum pa ste// gnyis kyi tshig ni gnyis su sbyar// kun la de bzhin zhing ldan te// yi ge byed kyis rnam par rgyan// drug pa'i bzhi pa phyung byas te/ bdun pa'i dngos pos
312a5(rgyud): gdan du bya// bcu gsum pa yis steng gnon pa'i// swA hA mthar bzhag sngags ni phyung // dang po rnam par snang mdzad pa bul// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i sngags yin no// sngags kyi rgyal po
312a6(rgyud): nyid kyi// mthu chen nyon cig mA ma kI// lan cig tsam gyis sngags bzlas na// skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig// khams gsum lus pa rnams kyang // zos par byang bar the tsom med// de yis 'od
312a7(rgyud): pa thams cad sbyin// dal ldan khrag 'bung mnyam 'gyur ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje
312a8(rgyud): can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las dpal ldan khrag 'thung bskyed pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// gzugs ni yang
312b1(rgyud): dag bshad par bya// zhal gsum pa la phag drug ste// dag po nag po dud pa'i 'od // 'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang // gtum mos spyan ni dmar po can// dmar ba'i smin ma ag choms 'bar// drag
312b2(rgyud): chen po ni zil gyis gnod// phyag na dag ste bsnams brtson pa// gtun shing rdo rje zhags pa dang // g.yon gyi phyag gi bsdigs mdzub kyis// sdang ba thams cad bsdigs par byed// ral gri phyag mtshan bsgom
312b3(rgyud): par bya// rig ma brgyad dang mnyam ldan zhing // sgo srung dang yang yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i pad+ma bsgom byas te// 'dab mar rig ma brgyad ni bkong // bdud rtsi ma dang bdud rtsi zhal// bdud rtsi can dang 'dud
312b4(rgyud): ci sbyar// grangs med ma dang gzugs bzang ma// maHsa pa'i gzugs can bang grub ma// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste// phyogs dang mtshams la dgod par bya// phyag
312b5(rgyud): goso bad+ma bsdams par 'dzin// de dag lha mo gang byed na sa// sna tshogs gzugs rnams mchog sbyin ma// bzhad tsarol po'i mdzad byed do// sngags kyi rgyal po byung bar bya/ 
312b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad yang 'bul nas// tshig 'di yis ni yongasu dgang // dang po yi ni gnyis pa ste// stong pa nyid ni gdan ldan pa// spong pas steng nas gnon pa'i sngags// mtha' nas swA hA sbyor bye'o// 
312b7(rgyud): gtan du shin tu dga' 'dor nas// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi byung nasu// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi sbyor ba yi// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgrub par bya// don kun dngos grub thams cad yang // de yis myur bar sgrub par
312b8(rgyud): 'gyur// pho 'am gal te mo dag gis// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba drad byed na// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// de yi phyag ma'il la kun gnas// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// dus rtag par ni bsgom ba
313a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsa rgyun chen po las dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'byung
313a2(rgyud): bzhes bya ba'i le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas ro langs chen po yis// sgrub pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// nag po'i ches brgyad bcu bzhi la// ling ga gcig dang lam mdzodang // shing gcig
313a3(rgyud): dang ni dur khrod dang // ri ngang chu 'gram de rnams la// las thams cad ni bsgrub pas// de bzhin ro langs slong ba ni// 'gags nas shib mo rnams ni// mtshan thams cad ni kun rdzogs pa// ga
313a4(rgyud): ba ma dang sle sha can// khyim chis ma rnams de dag mi/ mdzes pa bzang ba rmi med pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags pa ste/ lo na nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed// bud med ro yi sku bzung sa// ga
313a5(rgyud): ba'i chu yis 'akru bar bya// sngags dang sman gyi rdolab la// gapung tsan dan dkar ba yos// de la brug par bya byas te// sna tshogs me tog spos rnams kyis// mched cing gtang ma

313b2(rgyud): dpa' bo sgrub pa pos// dung chen gyis ni rgyar byas pa// thod pa'i phreng bong bcings pa yi// khrag 'bung gzugs ni sgom byed pas// de la cang te'u brdungs na su// gar byed cing mi khang par 'jug/ de yi

313b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i ag btsar bya// ro langs kyis ni gang sgrog sa byed// de tshe sngags pas mi 'jigs te// khrag 'thung sngags ni dran par bya// langs pa'i raM langs de yis yang // sgrub pa
313b5(rgyud): po la 'di skad smras// dpa' chen po kye las gang yad// bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can// ral gri mig sman sa 'og da// na mkha' la rgyu bar 'dod pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod

313b7(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung yin// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du// sgrub pa po yo de yang 'dred// rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje nga gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
